messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if First Aid is administered within one hour?
It grants 1 hit point recovery.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can First Aid be administered by a single character, or does it require two people?
Two people can work together to administer First Aid.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum time required to treat injuries using the Medicine skill?
one hour
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if Medicine is not performed on the same day as damage is taken?
The difficulty level is increased (requiring a Hard success)
You are a helpful assistant.
Under what conditions can an exception be made when treating a dying character?
When treating a dying character, the best that can be achieved with First Aid is to temporarily stabilize the patient.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a character's hit points and a Major Wound after being reduced to zero?
A character is dying when their hit points are reduced to zero and they have also sustained a Major Wound.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if this is not performed on the same day?
The difficulty level is increased (requiring a Hard success).
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required to stabilize a dying character?
Only the First Aid skill can be used.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a character fails a CON roll at the end of a round after being stabilized with First Aid?
They lose the temporary hit point and revert to the start of the Dying process
You are a helpful assistant.
What skill can be used to stabilize a dying character in Call of Cthulhu?
The First Aid skill
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a dying character fails a CON roll after being stabilized with First Aid?
They lose the temporary hit point and revert to the start of the Dying process.
You are a helpful assistant.
How does a successful Medicine roll affect a dying character's hit points?
It increases hit points by 1D3.

What happens to a character's hit points after a successful Medicine roll?
Increase hit points by 1D3.

What happens to a character's hit points after a recovery roll?
Increase hit points by 1D3.

How many hit points does Harvey gain immediately after receiving medical assistance?

How long does Harvey need to rest to recover from regular damage?
A week
